original_text: But he said, Nay; lest while ye gather up the tares, ye root up also the wheat with them.
korean_text: 주인이 이르되 가만 두라 가라지를 뽑다가 곡식까지 뽑을까 염려하노라

sentences.original_text: lest while ye gather up the tares,
ye root up also the wheat with them.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 그것과 함께 밀도 뽑아낼까 하여.
